title: Chocolat no Mahou (The Magic of Chocolate)
synopsis: Chocolatier Chocolat Aikawa and her enigmatic acquaintance Cacao Theobroma run a shop named Chocolat Noir, which is famous for its specially crafted chocolates, known to miraculously grant wishes. A variety of troubled individuals find themselves in front of the shop, seeking its merchandise, but these chocolates are expensiveâ€”each customer must pay with their most precious belonging.
